<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <UiScreen> <Operations> <Op action="/moi/account/tmpid/edit/?totalAccountNumber=2&service=picasa&displayName=P2&displayName=P1" type="Submit"></Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>Information</Title> <Message>You must enter the
temporary ID that you
received from the 'Web
Connected Registration'
process. If you have not
yet received your
temoporary ID please start
the 'Web Connected
Registration' process by
clicking the "Brother Web
Connect" option in your
computer's Start Menu or go
to the following internet
address.
http://www.brother.com/
cloud11/</Message> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
